# Risk Register

## Summary Statistics
```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
p1 <- ggplot(count(risk, RISKCATEGORY), 
             aes(area = n, fill = RISKCATEGORY, label = RISKCATEGORY)) +
        geom_treemap() +
        geom_treemap_text() + 
        scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
        theme(legend.position = "none") +
        ggtitle("Risk Categories")

p2 <- ggplot(count(risk, COMPONENT), 
             aes(area = n, fill = COMPONENT, label = COMPONENT)) +
        geom_treemap() +
        geom_treemap_text() + 
        scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
        theme(legend.position = "none") +
        ggtitle("Project Components")

p3 <- ggplot(count(risk, RISK_STRATEGY), 
             aes(area = n, fill = RISK_STRATEGY, label = RISK_STRATEGY)) +
        geom_treemap() +
        geom_treemap_text() + 
        scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
        theme(legend.position = "none") +
        ggtitle("Risk Strategy")

p4 <- ggplot(count(risk, TIMING_OF_DELAY), 
             aes(area = n, fill = TIMING_OF_DELAY, label = TIMING_OF_DELAY)) +
        geom_treemap() +
        geom_treemap_text() + 
        scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
        theme(legend.position = "none") +
        ggtitle("Timing of Delay")

grid.arrange(p1, p2, p3, p4, nrow = 2, ncol = 2)
```
